snippet.title: Going retro as Des rolls the dice
snippet.content:
THE NRL SuperCoach Countdown Show will get into the spirit of Retro Round while assessing Des Hasler's radical reshuffle at the Bulldogs. With Hasler's attempt to revive the moribund Canterbury attack sparking widespread comment Tom and the panel will look at it from a SuperCoach perspective. FOLLOW THE LIVE STREAM ON FACEBOOK AND TWITTER The team will bring you late mail and the final 17s for tonight's round 22 opener between the Bulldogs and Eels. Just as importantly, with the Perfect 8 jackpot having reached $200,000 the Countdown Show panel will be looking at every clash and giving you their Perfect 8 tips. Tom, Dave Von Kotze, Anthony Minichiello and Trent Copeland will also answer your questions, debate the issues and bring you late-breaking news.
NRL: Breanna Holden and Tom Sangster go over the winners and losers from round 21 in the NRL.
SuperCoach: Winners & Losers * Tune in for regular segments OTEN out of 10, Perfect 8, Eat My Hat, Copes' Captains and VK's POD Watch. * Follow the live stream on Facebook or Twitter from 6.30pm for last-minute team news, tips and late mail. * Get your SuperCoach questions answered live. : Hashtag questions #AskSupercoach LEAVE A COMMENT AT BELOW AND WE'LL ANSWER IT Originally published as
